description: Calm, supportive, and trustworthy mental well-being dashboard

gradients.name: Skyline Gradient
gradients.usage: Use for hero sections, background overlays

gradients.name: Oceanic Gradient
gradients.usage: Use for accent elements, progress bars

design_tips: Use primary color for buttons and active elements
Secondary color for navigation, dividers, and subtle accents
Accent color for interactive states like hover and focus
Prioritize clear typography and ample white space
Maintain a minimalist and uncluttered design
Ensure high contrast for readability in both light and dark modes

logo_ideas.name: Abstract Wave Logo
logo_ideas.description: A stylized wave forming a calming shape, representing emotional flow and stability
